content.question: You will be asked to speak in Chinese on a specific topic. Imagine you are making an oral presentation to your Chinese class. First, you will read and hear the topic for your presentation. Then you will have 2 minutes to record your presentation. Your presentation should be as complete as possible. Choose ONE Chinese social aspect that is associated with the rural migrant worker population (rural economy , family structure, education, etc.). In your presentation, describe this social aspect and explain its significance. Prompt 1
